    • Method Detail

      • delete_from_database

        @When(value="^delete from (.+) database$")
public void delete_from_database(java.lang.String url,
                                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> params)
        Executes delete sql statement in desired database.
        Multiple statements can be provided if more than one delete shall be executed.
        Parameters:
        url - String, connection string of the database that shall be used
        params - Map, table that contains sql statement

      • edit_in_database

        @When(value="^edit in (.+) database$")
public void edit_in_database(java.lang.String url,

        Executes update sql statement in desired database.
        Multiple statements can be provided if more than one update shall be executed.
        Parameters:

        params - Map, table that contains sql statement

      • load_data_from_csv_file_into_a_table

        @Given(value="^load data from csv file (.*?) into a table (.*?) in (.+) database$")
public void load_data_from_csv_file_into_a_table(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String url)
        Loads data from csv file to data base
        It uses csv file as an input and TestData.{filename}.TypeMapping object
        TypeMapping shall contain mapping columns to type for particular csv
        Type mapping shall be in the form of a List. For example
        inputTypeMapping : ["NUMERIC","VARCHAR","VARCHAR"], where input file name is input.csv
        Input file shall be located in subdirectory input
        Parameters:
        fileName, - String, name of the input csv file that contains input data (without .csv extension)
        tableName, - String, name of the table to which data shall be loaded
        url - String, connection string of the database that shall be used

      • verify_in_database

        @Then(value="^verify in (.+) database$")
public void verify_in_database(java.lang.String url,
                                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Executes sql query in desired database and compares results with a template.
        Sql query and template name shall be passed to this step as a table.
        Parameters:
        url - String, connection string of the database that shall be used
        params - Map, table that contains sql query and template name
